Reviews.Title: Great package and exellent image quality
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: The combination package I received with my Canon D60 Body Only camera  from The Imaging World contained just what I needed to get quickly up and running including a Zeikos Card Reader, a Vidpro Memory Card, a Zeikos back-up battery and charger and  a VIDPRO  SLR Case, at a price that was less than what a new Body alone would have cost from other sources at the time.It was a real challenge to choose between the Canon D60 and the t3i to replace my aged but indestructible Digital Rebel.  However, I went with the D60 despite the added cost and, having used it for several weeks, am pleased with the choice. The D60 is much better built  and more rugged than the t3i, feels better in the grip, has quicker and more accurate focusing, more rapid firing capability and longer battery life.  What I like most about the D60, in contrast to the old Rebel, are image quality, particularly in low light, ease of focusing and state of the art video capability.  Like all Canon cameras, the D60 is very easy to use  at the basic level yet provides capabilities that will take years to master.  The D60 is 5 stars in my book.

Reviews.Title: ARRIVED EARLY! LOVE THIS PACKAGE!!!
Reviews.Author: SandersPKT
Reviews.Content: So I was extremely worried ordering a camera this expensive online and having arrive new and in tact, but I swear they fast-tracked shipment or something because this package arrived the next day! FedEx showed it hadn't even left the building on their online tracker but this package arrived super fast with everything in perfect condition. I am so relieved and happy with my camera, the amazing price, and all of the goodies it came with for basically FREE!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. John Temple "JAT"
Reviews.Content: I have long been a Canon fan and this camera is no disappointment. I had a 50D and although in some respects the 60D is inferior to the 50D (eg body construction) the lighter body is a plus. I also like the swing out display permitting photos to be taken from waist height. The video facility is also top class.

Reviews.Title: Canon D60 EOS Camera KIT
Reviews.Author: Carol E. Thaemert ""The Family Geek""
Reviews.Content: I've been waiting for the right time to buy.. waiting for the best price I could find. Got it just recently through Amazon from The Imaging World. A fantastic package with all the extras I needed to get started. Body only as I was upgrading my Rebel XT. I already had my lenses. The 60D has so many better features! I am thrilled with its performance. Imaging World filled the order so prompt, I had the camera in just a few business days on the Free Shipping. Always a Canon Camera user. This one is great and I got it for a great price.

Reviews.Title: best package
Reviews.Author: Alejandra Nava
Reviews.Content: I really want this camera since I know about it, the only thing I dont like is that doesnt have the syncro plug for other flashes. I dont know the name of that I hope you understand me. But every thing else are great, the photos are magnificent. I dont already use the video so I hope use it soon.

Reviews.Title: My camera is great, Shipping FAST!
Reviews.Author: Sam Sphabmixay
Reviews.Content: I've had the camera for a couple of years now and I have to say that its superb. The card should however be upgraded to a better memory class and speed but it works for a start! I highly advise a bigger bag if your gonna start purchasing a new bag but the kit itself is a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Great package, great price
Reviews.Author: Steven Drexler
Reviews.Content: Came the day after I ordered it even though I only asked for standard shipping.Everything include is of good quality, The camera bag will hold the camera with one lens. I don't think I it will hold an extra lens.The only issue of concern is that the camera box is for the Body + 28-200 lens kit. So I think The Imaging World takes the lens out to sell separately, which is why the price was so low ($699). It's a great deal.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Melissa
Reviews.Content: What a great middle of the road camera! I wanted an upgrade from my rebel and didn't want to get to ahead of myself and this was the perfect step up. It really shoots beautifully and quick. I did alot research between this and the T4i and I couldn't be happier with my purchase!!! It's everything I thought it would be!! I can see why this has been such a solid camera :-)

Reviews.Title: This is my first foray into DSLR, and I love this camera.
Reviews.Author: grannyhaun
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning how to use it effectively, but I love the results I've gotten this far. My previous Canon experiences had been an AE1 Program and a G10 Powershot. This camera has enough of the "Canon" feel for parts to feel familiar but goes way, way beyond in capabilities. Very happy with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Everything is just fine so far, except the HD video and the small bag
Reviews.Author: HN
Reviews.Content: The Camera: I took thousand pics so far and I am quite happy with the quality. For the HD movie, it is really bad. I tried both 1920 x 1080 and 1280 x 720 but whenever I moved the camera, the movie stopped for a while. It's too bad. Only at 640 x 480, the movie is quite good.Camera case: Very small if you have more than one lens.The rest: quite good.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Weimin Jiang "W M J"
Reviews.Content: it's a great package, everything is cool, very valuable package,strongly recommended it to my close friend, don't nothing missed in the package, u have everything you need, love it, love it, love it

Reviews.Title: satisfecho con la compra
Reviews.Author: Carlos Gomez
Reviews.Content: Es justamente lo que esperaba, buen producto, llego sin problemas estoy contento, me gusta y prodría recomendarlos sin ningún problema. satisfecho con la compra

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Rose Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I'm a film student and Canon 60D is very popular amongst my fellow film students here in Southern California. It's compact, and  convenient. The viewer can flip around for tricky angles and it's super light, which is great when you have to shoot a long scene. The quality is amazing! Thanks Canon 60D & Amazon for helping me putting my short doc into the NB Film Fest :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent service great product
Reviews.Author: Scm354
Reviews.Content: Ordered new 60d to replace stolen one.  Vendor provided exactley what is described.  Shipped on time beat the Xmas rush and now have great photos at Xmas.

Reviews.Title: Canon 60D
Reviews.Author: EDmurse
Reviews.Content: I had been saving up for a DSLR, and was trying to decide between this and the T3i, in the end, I went with the 60D and I am very pleased with my choice.  It takes great pictures, has several features which I like (i.e. Pentaprism viewfinder, layout of controls) and overall is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Nicole Turner
Reviews.Content: This camera has been a blessing for me!  There are so many functions to use...the images come out great!The shipping for this product was so fast, which was wonderful.Great camera for professionals who can't afford Mark II or Mark III.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Bundle
Reviews.Author: Fdo V
Reviews.Content: Camera: excellentCase: very small considering that you need to take a lens, the camera and flashMemory Case: very cheap manufacturing. strong oil/ plastic smellRest.... not best in class but they work.

ProductInfo.Features:
18 Megapixel APS-C CMOS Sensor | 1920 x 1080 HD Video Capture
SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Slot | Vari-Angle Clear View 3.0" Flip-Out LCD
DIGIC 4 Image Processor | 5.3 fps Continuous Shooting
Works with all Canon EF and EF-S Lenses | ISO 6400 - Expandable to 12797
NOTE: includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories packaged in the original kit box except for the lens
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 60D SLR Digital Camera Body + Large Vidpro Camera and Lens Case (Black) + Extra High Capacity Lithium-Ion Battery Pack + Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Memory Card + Card Reader + Memory Card Case + Zeikos Shutter Release + Digital Camera Cleaning Kit.
